lang.saveConfirm: Are you sure you want to save the page?
lang.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this theme?
lang.visitSiteConfirm: Are you sure you wish to save the page and open it in a new tab?
lang.motopressDescription: MotoPress Layout Editor is a professional plugin for developers that enables to build a layout of your WordPress website by dragging and dropping site blocks. It makes easy to manage the structure of a page, add, move and remove its objects and view the changes at once. MotoPress Layout Editor is compatible with themes made specially for this plugin. How to modify your theme for the Layout Editor you can check here. For more detailed information visit getmotopress.com
lang.themeNotSupported: Theme is not supported. Find out how to modify this theme for MotoPress Layout Editor plugin.
lang.insertContentInLayoutError: Can not insert content in layout wrapper
lang.changeContentLayoutError: Error while changing content in layout wrapper
lang.duplicateErrorTemplateExists: Template with the same name already exists.
lang.editLoopMessage: If the display of the page is selected you may edit the content by going to the section %link1% Pages %endlink1% and choose the corresponding page there. If the display of posts is selected you may modify the content by going to the section %link% Posts %endlink%. To view the changes you need to reload the page.
lang.editSidebarMessage: To add widgets to the sidebar go to %link% Widgets %endlink%, choose a widget area with the selected name and edit widgets. To view the changes you need to reload the page.
lang.jQueryVerNotSupported: MotoPress uses jQuery and jQuery UI with WordPress. Minimum jQuery version - %minjQueryVer%. Minimum jQueryUI version - %minjQueryUIVer%. Please update WordPress to version 3.4 or higher.
lang.browserNotSupported: Your browser is not supported. We recommend to use the latest version of one of these supported browsers: Firefox, Chrome.
lang.permissionDenied: Maybe you are not logged in or you have no permission
lang.validationName: The field should not be blank and contain certain characters : *, /
lang.blocksOverflow: You have reached the maximum number of blocks available for this row
lang.welcomeToMotopressMessage:
Welcome to MotoPress visual editor. The current version allows you to:
1. Change the template for website pages or duplicate them.
2. Edit the page templates structure (add, move and remove blocks)
3. Display and hide blocks for different devices.
